component.name: libjpeg-turbo
component.summary: The libjpeg-turbo JPEG library is a library for handling JPEG files.

description.p: libjpeg-turbo is a JPEG image codec that uses SIMD instructions (MMX, SSE2, NEON) to accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression on x86, x86-64, and ARM systems.
The libjpeg-turbo JPEG library is an API/ABI compatible with the IJG JPEG library.
